item.title: Whats the code to change lunar magic ? PLZ LOOK
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

setSidebarInterface(6, 18787);

Change the ‘18787’ to the interface which you want the magic tab to be changed to once you click the object.

Read full topic
item.source: Whats the code to change lunar magic ? PLZ LOOK

item.title: Whats the code to change lunar magic ? PLZ LOOK
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

Ok. please help me i got somfting like this:

if (objectID == 410) { f (playerAncientMagics == 2 || playerAncientMagics == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); // /normal = 1151 playerAncientMagics = 0; sM("You convert to normal magic!"); } else if (playerAncientMagics == 0 && q10 == 15) { setSidebarInterface(6, 18787); playerAncientMagics = 2; sM("You convert to lunar magicks!"); } }

what did i do wrong please give me the good one or say what i did wrong? PLEASE =[

Read full topic
